Text: Note from Rick GordonMerrill LynchDave Komansky Merrill Lynchs President Chairman and Chief Executive Officer would like the opportunity to meet you He is interested in identifying and meeting with potential new Board members and would like to get together with you either in Houston when he is next here in the fall or in New York when it is convenient for you Please give me a call at as to whether such a meeting would be of interest to you Rick Gordon
